meanings.definition: An exceptionally large or powerful wave.
meanings.sent1: The superwave crashed onto the shore with great force.
meanings.sent2: The surfers were excited to catch a superwave at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The superwave was so big, it washed away all the sandcastles on the beach.
meanings.sent4: The superwave of emotions overwhelmed her as she watched the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The superwave towered over the tiny boats, a majestic sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A wave that is larger or more powerful than usual.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen were caught off guard by the sudden superwave.
meanings.sent2: The superwave in the pool created excitement among the swimmers.
meanings.sent3: The superwave at the water park made everyone scream with delight.
meanings.sent4: The superwave of applause filled the auditorium after the performance.
meanings.sent5: The superwave of sound from the concert echoed through the stadium.
